mantras.title: Ganesh Maha Mantra
mantras.translation: Salutations to Lord Ganesha, who is the remover of obstacles and the lord of beginnings.

mantras.title: Ganesh Gayatri Mantra
mantras.sanskrit: ॐ एकदन्ताय विद्धमहे, वक्रतुण्डाय धीमहि, तन्नो दन्ति प्रचोदयात्
mantras.transliteration: Om Ekadantaya Viddhamahe, Vakratundaya Dhimahi, Tanno Danti Prachodayat
mantras.translation: We meditate upon the single-tusked Lord Ganesha, may he inspire and enlighten us.

mantras.title: Ganesha Shubh Labh Mantra
mantras.sanskrit: ॐ श्रीं गम सौभाग्य गणपतये वरवरद सर्वजन्म में वशमानय स्वाहा
mantras.transliteration: Om Shreem Gam Saubhagya Ganpataye Varvarda Sarvajanma Mein Vashamanya Swaha
mantras.translation: We invoke the one with the single tusked elephant tooth to bring us good fortune and to attract all good things towards us.

mantras.title: Ganapati Invocation
mantras.sanskrit: वक्रतुण्ड महाकाय सूर्यकोटि समप्रभ। निर्विघ्नं कुरु मे देव सर्वकार्येषु सर्वदा॥
mantras.transliteration: Vakratunda Mahakaya Suryakoti Samaprabha. Nirvighnam Kuru Me Deva Sarvakaryeshu Sarvada.
mantras.translation: O lord with the curved trunk and mighty body, who has the magnificence of a million suns, I pray to you to remove the obstacles from all the actions I intend to perform.
